divs: Sighting DetailsOn a train, spotted odd looking object in sky smaller than a plane. Thinking that must be a helicopter at an odd angle, i kept staring. The object seemed to turn, and caught the sunlight on its surface. Colour was between a grey and white. It turned and I saw clearly that it was a saucer. I lost sight of it as my train pulled into the station. I felt excited and privileged to see it.
trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around November 4th 2009
Summary: Spotted a saucer in the sky above the clapham junction area
